version_description:
Updates in this version:
1. Add 11 new skills!
2. Add new equipment set: Red Dragon Set;
3. Add lucky gacha system;
4. Translation optimization;
5. Add circulatory task system;
6. Hero mode unlock logic optimization;
7. Add circulatory task system;
8. Add some new packs;
8. Fixed some bugs;
We fixed some bugs in this version and optimized the gaming experience.

2. Fix the legendary chest problem;
3. Add VIP purchase;

Formal Version
ver: 2.2.1
